string.text: Grants Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting.
Grants Extra Arrows.
Stronger Javelins
Replaces Menavlion with Long Menavlion, longer but slower.
Longer Sword
Heavier Crossbow
Replaces Menavlion with Heavy Menavlion, slower but deals more damage.
Faster Release
Replaces Voulge with Two Handed Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting, two handed.
Replaces mount with a more maneuverable horse.
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.
Strong Arrows
Replaces mount with a faster and more maneuverable horse.
Replaces mount with a more maneuverable, durable but slower horse that deals more charge damage.
Replaces Sickle with Hammer, effective against armored opponents.
Grants Strong Arrows, deals more damage.
Faster Horse
Replaces Gladius with Pugio, much faster but shorter and deals less damage.
Grants Throwing Axes, provides ranged damage, effective against shields, low in quantity.
Grants Heavy Lance, more damage than spears, couchable.
Replaces Higland Spear with Highland Long Spear, longer but deals less damage.
Replaces Hunting Bow with Guard's Bow, deals more damage, accurate but slower.
Grants Lance, longer than spears but slower, couchable.
Grants Lance, longer than spears, couchable.
Heavy Kontos, deals more damage but is slow. Cant be used with shields.

Pavise Shield
Replaces Recurve Bow with Composite Bow, deals more damage and accurate but slower.
Replaces Spear with Longer Spear.

Replaces Flyssa with Kaskara, longer and deals more damage.
Replaces Sword with Heavy Mace, effective against armored opponents.
Two Handed Axe
Replaces Javelins with Imperial Javelins, deals more damage, can be used in melee.
Heavy Menavlion
Replaces Recurve Bow with Composite Bow, more accurate, deals more damage but slower.

Replaces Sword with Mace, effective against armored opponents.
Provides stronger javelins.

Replaces Axe with Bastard Axe, longer, can be used two handed.

Long Spear

Replaces Two Handed Axe with Two Handed Maul. Effective against armored opponents, two handed.

Replaces Arrows with Stronger Arrows, deals more damage.
Replaces Axe with Sword, effective at dueling and thrusting.

Heavy Lance
Replaces Voulge with a Sword and Shield combination. Grants versatility and protection.

Replaces mount with a horse that deals more charge damage.

Bow and Arrows
